top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!
Love what your doing.  Very interesting and entertaining.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Me watching that view of all the models: "This is a Unix system, I know this..."
Why can't the concrete bench be over 8'?

Dont do Push to open!! i have them in my kitchen, at first they were cool, but if you think about it... opening a kabinett ist a one-step thing, just pull and it opens. these pushtopenthingies make that a two-step action... inefficient... bothers the hell out of me... also they open everytime you hit or lean angainst them...
Push to open doors can get really annoying if you just happen to brush against it slightly and it flips open. I don't like it.
